artist: Artist: Pablo Picasso; Author: Pablo Picasso; Publisher: Pablo Picasso
creditline: The Herschel V. Jones Fund, by exchange
description: Blue-green paper album cover with printed paper title
image_copyright: © Estate of Pablo Picasso %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Blue-green paper cover for album containing two etchings with sugar-lift aquatint and scraper; letterpress and facsimile of handwritten text printed in heliogravure
portfolio: From Sueño y Mentira de Franco (The Dream and Lie of Franco)
provenance: (David Tunick, New York); sold to MIA, 1979.
text:
The 18 etched scenes Picasso made for this portfolio were originally intended to be cut out as postcards and sold individually at the Spanish pavilion of the 1937 Paris World's Fair to benefit the Spanish Refugee Relief Fund.

Portfolio includes prose poem written by Picasso, with translations in French and English.
title: Cover from Sueño y Mentira de Franco (Dream and Lie of Franco)
